languages.text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Сенешаль почти вскрикивает, в его голосе — неподдельный гнев.{/n} "Прежде чем обвинять, дозвольте выслушать!"
"Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Сенешаль почти вскрикивает, в его голосе — неподдельный гнев.{/n} "Прежде чем обвинять, дозвольте выслушать!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Seneschal almost shouts it out, his voice full of genuine anger.{/n} "Would you kindly hear out the matter before levelling accusations!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Seneschal almost shouts it out, his voice full of genuine anger.{/n} "Would you kindly hear out the matter before levelling accusations!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Seneschal almost shouts it out, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Would you kindly hear out the matter before levelling accusations!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人！”{n}阿贝拉德几乎吼出了这句话，声音里充满了真切的愤怒。{/n}“请您先听我把话说完，再对我的家族提出指控！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！”{n}阿贝拉德几乎吼出了这句话，声音里充满了真切的愤怒。{/n}“请您先听我把话说完，再对我的家族提出指控！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Der Truchsess schreit es fast, echter Zorn liegt in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Gestattet mir, den Sachverhalt zu erläutern, ehe Ihr mit Anschuldigungen um Euch werft!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Der Truchsess schreit es fast, echter Zorn liegt in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Wäret Ihr so gut, Euch den Sachverhalt anzuhören, ehe Ihr mit Anschuldigungen um Euch werft?!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}El senescal te exhorta casi a voz en grito, presa de una ira genuina.{/n} «¡Permítame explicarle los detalles al completo antes de lanzar acusaciones!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}El senescal te exhorta casi a voz en grito, presa de una ira genuina.{/n} «¡Haga usted el favor de escuchar los detalles antes de lanzar acusaciones!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}s'exclame le sénéchal d'une voix empreinte de colère, en se retenant de justesse de crier.{/n} « Écoutez-moi avant de proférer de telles accusations ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}s'exclame le sénéchal d'une voix empreinte de colère, en se retenant de justesse de crier.{/n} « Je vous en prie, écoutez-moi avant de proférer de telles accusations ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}家令長は怒鳴らんばかりに言う。その声は純粋な怒りに満ちていた。{/n}「非難する前に、どうかこの問題の全容を聞いていただけませんか！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}家令長は怒鳴らんばかりに言う。その声は純粋な怒りに満ちていた。{/n}「非難する前に、どうかこの問題の全容を聞いていただけませんか！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan!" {n}Neredeyse bağıran Seneşal'in sesinde saf bir öfke duyuluyor.{/n} "Kimseyi suçlamadan önce durumu detaylıca açıklamama izin verin!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}the Seneschal almost shouts, his voice filled with genuine anger.{/n} "Allow me to lay out the matter in full before levelling accusations!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan!" {n}Seneşal neredeyse bağırıyor, sesinde saf bir öfke duyuluyor.{/n} "Kimseyi suçlamadan önce durumu detaylıca açıklamama izin verin!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
